website_summaries.verdict: If an extra large cover for the longest of sleds is what you need, get the SledGear Deluxe.
pros: With three accurate size options, this cover is an excellent choice when you need the assurance that it will fit your sled properly
The ProtekX fabric is tough, and the elastic hem cord and adjustable straps ensure a snug fit
Works well for trailering or outdoor storage
cons: The cover can be difficult to get on

customer_reviews.title: Great snow machine cover! Would/will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review in July after working on my machine today. I have used this cover for one season.. I traveled 400 mile round trip almost Every weekend this winter 2019. The cover has a pile of tie down straps “my iPad cam up with that”, the cover fit my Yamaha Nitro very well with a little extra which wrapped around my snow flap There wasn’t any flapping on the cover at all at 70mph. I would bet I’ll get at least 3 to 4 years depending on the road time It protects my machine 365 from the elements. I will buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Mike T

customer_reviews.title: Good cover for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover for my 99 Arctic Cat ZRT 800 and for the most part it fits good. It is plenty long enough but did fit a little tight around the hood and belly pans. This is mainly due to the triples being wider in the front than the twins. There are lots of straps on the cover to hold it in place while being hauled on the trailer. I did have issues with the front of the cover coming off while being trailered and that is the reason for 4 stars instead of 5. If you're looking for a good aftermarket snowmobile cover this is your cover.
customer_reviews.author: Bmillz

customer_reviews.title: OK Cover But Not UV Resistant
customer_reviews.text: We've used this cover on our snowmobiles for years because it is reasonably priced and has enough tie-down straps to securely keep it in place. Unfortunately, this cover is not UV resistant. It lasts 2 to 3 years at the most. We live in the mountains of Colorado so UV is a killer for many materials up here. The snowmobile and their covers are stored outside year-around. Amortizing the cost of this cover over 3 years makes it pretty cheap protection, so we just go with a known replacement every 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: JOC

customer_reviews.title: fits 2013 freeride 146 with handgaurds
customer_reviews.text: tons of straps so takes a bit to get a system down. material is strong, zipper for fuel fill not velcro, straps in front to cover spindles, covers the tunnel unlike the skidoo brand cover and 1/3 price. wish it went a bit further around the nose but still great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Fit well to size not as tightly fitting on the hood as would have liked but pretty good fit since it is made to fit multiple models/styles. I would probably like to see some reinforcing near the handle grip areas so it does not wear through quickly.
customer_reviews.author: DEE

customer_reviews.title: Fit my SkiDoo Grand Touring 137inch track
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about the fit,as my touring sled has a high backrest and handgrips for the passenger. The fit was excellent, good straps and ties for trailering. Fabric is strong and well sewn. I would recommend. I purchased the XL size for my sled.
customer_reviews.author: tpurcell

customer_reviews.title: would like to get a replacement but unfortunately no contact seller ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought two and used on two trips but one ripped by the zipper while driving, would like to get a replacement but unfortunately no contact seller button that I can find anywhere. Other than that they stay on great and tie downs are great and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Sw22

customer_reviews.title: They go on and off easy, kind of hard to figure out the first ...
customer_reviews.text: We have bought several of these to replace our impossible to find original Yamaha covers. They go on and off easy, kind of hard to figure out the first few times. Seem to hold up pretty good so far, we have had them 2 seasons so far. The straps come apart at both ends which is nice if you need to replace them but also easy to lose them. The extra large is too long for our 2000 era mountain max machines but reg or med size fits very good.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Brings curses.
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly on poo 2009 shift 600 long track. I blame this thing for bringing a curse to the sled. 2 days after I put it on the engine blew up. Took a beating on spring logging roads and kept sled looking nice underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Almostcanadian

customer_reviews.title: solid covers at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I jumped on these when I found them at a really good price on Amazon. My older covers were breaking down from sun and weather exposure. These seem pretty sturdy. There are LOTS of tied down straps and hooks - great for trailering. But I don't trailer, just use for yard storage, so all the straps are sometimes annoying. BUT that's not much of an issue vs if you didn't have enough tie downs when you need them. I'm hoping the light colored panel will make these a little more resistant to sun damage than my old all black ones of unknown manufacture.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie W. Dunaway

customer_reviews.title: Medium sized cover works great for vintage sleds
customer_reviews.text: I have a 1978 Polaris TX. I ordered the medium sized cover and it was plenty big enough. Cover is of good quality for the price. My sled even has the high windshield, and there is plenty of room to spare. I believe my sled measures around 90 inches from the front of the hood to the rear grab bar. I saw that the other reviewer said the medium sized cover wasn't big enough for his "older" sled, but I feel like the medium sized cover would fit most vintage sleds. I'm going to test fit it on my 79 Blizzard 9500 and will add to my review.
customer_reviews.author: B. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Keep me clean and protected!
customer_reviews.text: The SledGear Deluxe for our Snowmobile had been great PROTECTING us for the weather! The also look nice when sitting out close by. Very durable!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Flajole

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a 1999 arctic cat zrt 800 i bought the large size and have more than enough to go over the seat and the back of the sled. Theres pleanty of straps to hold it down. It just fits the front theres a strap loop on the front that i put a bungee through it for extra support but overall its really nice and im buying a second 1 for the other sled.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: Used this on my 2015 Rev XR X 1200. Dealership wanted $250.00 for a Ski Doo cover. This is a Great cover for the money. I’ll never buy another name brand cover again.
customer_reviews.author: W15

customer_reviews.title: 3 years old now
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with the quality. They have been stored outside but not in sunlight for 3 years and they are currently still in good condition. I am very happy with the size, fitting, and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tweakes182

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for great price.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, looks like good quality material and fits my sled perfectly. I bought the large and it is just the right length for my Yamaha Mountain Max. Lots of ties to secure cover to sled. I love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Superchevy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, works well for travel.
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price, lots of straps, fit well. Remember not to add the skis into the measurements.
customer_reviews.author: WI Girl!

customer_reviews.title: A Good Quality Snowmobile cover
customer_reviews.text: A very good quality non OEM cover. Great quality material and a good fit on a 2002 Polaris Sport Touring machine. My Polaris has a rack on the back and the contour of the cover fits very well. You do have to snug down all the straps if you are transporting on an open trailer. The bottom has an elastic hem all around. These last 3 years with outdoor storage. A great value.
customer_reviews.author: Pinot Noir

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: It ripped within the 2 year Of having it. It hit moldy and color faded right away.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Cardinali

customer_reviews.title: Quality cover but does not work with high windshields
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality cover especially for the price. The only reason it did not receive 5 stars is because it will not work with machines with high windshields. Would not work with my Bearcat Z1 XT GS.
customer_reviews.author: bobby

customer_reviews.title: Lots of tension lines to hold it in place
customer_reviews.text: Nylon quality seems good. By comparison to others I've owned, I'd predicted it will last about 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Good quality material
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and reasonable price. Fits my 96 Ski doo Grand Touring great. Lots of tie down straps for trailering and very good quality. Would definitely buy again if needed for my other sleds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have one other cover like this and yes it WILL FADE
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 2003 RMK 144 perfectly. I have one other cover like this and yes it WILL FADE. But for the price, this is a heavy duty cover that offers great protection, both for storage and trailing.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Well-made cover for the money
customer_reviews.text: A good cover, well made, easy to install and remove, has held up to all kinds of weather.
customer_reviews.author: C & J

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This sled cover is excellent. It's sitting on 2 different touring sleds. The only issue that I have with it is the length in back. I wish it would cover the tracks so that snow doesn't corrode them when not in use. It looks just like the picture when on. The appearance from the photo is black and white but in reality it's a light grey. I'm really happy with this purchase because it's made well and easy to put on. It won't come off in high winds either which is a plus when driving or windy days.
customer_reviews.author: Denise RichTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my father, very nice cover fits his snowmachine perfect
customer_reviews.author: SAVO4LIFE

customer_reviews.title: Good at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and easy to handle. Durability will be tested over time.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gacke

customer_reviews.title: A lot of bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made+ Fast shipping+ Great price= You can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Walker

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Appears well made and just as good as the more expensive brand name covers. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mick R. Braun

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover.  Great straps and zipper flap.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Especially like the zipper fuel flap (which is in the right location) and the tie down straps with metal hooks, not the plastic ones that break. The front is a good fit for my 53" tall machine, but the middle and rear could be a little taller as the tunnel is exposed more than I would like.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great cover!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2011 Polaris IQ turbo coupled 136. Length as measured for cover fit is 118 inches. This fits like a glove and is a fantastic cover. Much better than anticipated and more than worth double the price. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Improve the sewing
customer_reviews.text: The cover seems heavy duty, but the stitching on the front loop was pulling out after the first trip. I repaired it and it has been ok so far. It seems to fit ok and doesn’t flap when all the straps are tightened.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has lots of sturdy tie downs
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 01 Skidoo Summit 800 with handle bar risers perfectly. Has lots of sturdy tie downs, and fabric seems plenty heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 1999 SkiDoo touring perfectly. I wish it was lined for the windshield, but for the price what can one expect? Great product
customer_reviews.author: bpro

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover so far. Only had it on sled for couple weeks. Lots of straps. Seems heavy duty for cost.
customer_reviews.author: Scott L.

customer_reviews.title: It’s held up great outside in the sun snow rain for 6months now
customer_reviews.text: It’s held up great outside in the sun snow rain for 6months now. Lots of straps for a secure fit. (2000 mxz700)
customer_reviews.author: Chief

customer_reviews.title: Could be a little taller for mtn sleds, but ...
customer_reviews.text: Could be a little taller for mtn sleds, but overall it works for my RMK. And it's much cheaper than the concert from Polaris.
customer_reviews.author: Jasin

customer_reviews.title: Not wide enough for a 2004 Polaris Edge Touring 550 sled
customer_reviews.text: The product does not fit my Polaris Edge Touring 550 sled. It doesnt cover the sides well
customer_reviews.author: Revere04

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the money! fit was perfect on my 163 rmk pro. Built very sturdy should trailer just fine. Will update
customer_reviews.author: Kassie LaBute

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I can see now why they were so cheap. They are seconds and were made incorrectly. One of the front ties is sown on upside down and is any stress is placed on it will tear. Not worth sending back, but company did not mention they were seconds and had this flaw. They just lowered the price to get rid of them.
customer_reviews.author: szabla

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be a nice product. Too soon to tell. It needs some trailer miles to properly evaluate. Would have bought another one, but the price doubled since 2 weeks ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for older sleds!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product if you're looking to cover and protect let's see how it holds up is the real test though
customer_reviews.author: Cody S.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Cover For The Price
customer_reviews.text: Much better quality than expected at this price. Nice heavy weight material and well made. Plenty of tie down straps. Only negative would be the belly strap winds up with the connector in the middle of the belly pan. Hard to reach and disconnect.
customer_reviews.author: Denton Fender

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cover
customer_reviews.text: Nice big cover for my sled. If and when it wears out I will buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice cover fits well but a little time consuming to put on
customer_reviews.author: J. Outlaw

customer_reviews.title: awesome quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: WOW !! awesome quality for the price. extremely happy with this so far, time will only tell though....
customer_reviews.author: Tina McAlister

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Horrible ripped at the handle bars on the first trip...got replacements and they ripped also....wont get them again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great - I have not tried towing with the cover on and I am not planning on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The material is good quality and should last through many seasons
customer_reviews.text: The cover fit my Polaris Touring sled perfectly. It has lots of strap and has stayed in place during some heavy duty wind it has been through. The material is good quality and should last through many seasons.
customer_reviews.author: S.R.K

customer_reviews.title: Snowmobile cover
customer_reviews.text: Was very pleased with the quality and fit of this item got it for my 2006 Polaris fst switchback and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: Snow Mobile Cover!
customer_reviews.text: Good price for a decent cover, and with straps to hold it on.
customer_reviews.author: Super Seven

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cover / Fits my 03 Ski-Doo 600 HO Rev
customer_reviews.text: Nice Cover / Fits my 03 Ski-Doo 600 HO Rev just right. I put the cover on today and it fits nice and looks like its good quality, I am very happy with it. I purchased the Classic 71847 131" to 145"L. I learned a long time ago with the Motorcycle covers its always better to go with a larger cover the next size up or even 2 sizes up from what they recommend, if the cover is to tight its not going to work very well or maybe not at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sven Ostrowski

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It worked great..put on 600 miles with no problems..I just checked the straps when I stopped..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very small
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 95 skidoo. its about 4" short. and actually too big for my 81 motoski. it will do for the vintage machine, i just wont trailer with it. made out of good thick material, lots of tiedowns. I only need it to keep the elements off; its a pain to recover seat all the time. Update 1/20/2016 They fade quickly. One of mine ripped at the handlebar. They are never used to trailer sleds. Only sat in yard. Should have just bought a tarp. Skidoo ones are better. They have lots of tiedowns and appear to be good quality, but they are not. If used as intended they may last 2 years. Skidoo lasted 10.
customer_reviews.author: B. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Nice universal cover for the price. Not worth searching for used oem covers anymore.
customer_reviews.author: DAN MYERS

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: If your concerned about the Quality of this product rest assured that the material is top notch and included straps are very handy. I would and will buy this product again
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Fit my 2013 Polaris Pro 163 perfect. Seems to be of good quality
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 2013 Polaris Pro 163 perfect. Seems to be of good quality. Definitely the best warranty for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ashlee Handler

customer_reviews.title: so good. Fit the sled well
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Fit the sled well. Seems to be made to last awhile. Maybe i will update when winter is over.
customer_reviews.author: Kip Palmateer

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Quality product! Fits like stock cover and travels exceptionally well on trailer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality cover.
customer_reviews.text: This cover is definitely of good quality. Fits my Skiidoo perfectly. Heavy construction. Lots of snap-buckle tie downs. Fuel door access in right location. I followed previous size recomendations and purchased the one size larger than what was stated by the manufacturer. Good fit.
customer_reviews.author: M. Peacock

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: We got this on a super deal. We already have one and needed another. Little did I know I would get it 70% off. Our other has worked great for a full sled season.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it has too many straps/tie-downs that catch on everything as you're taking it on and off the sled.
customer_reviews.author: vinny

customer_reviews.title: this cover is perfect and a good price
customer_reviews.text: the color looks good and my man likes the ease of putting it on
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is more than I expected. It is durable and has more tie downs than I thought it would. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome straps everywhere for effective tie
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding fits my polaris rmk 155 2014!!!! Awesome straps everywhere for effective tie down
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Large size fit my 2001 arctic cat zl550 perfectly. I like the straps. Cover feels durable.
customer_reviews.author: bryan

customer_reviews.title: this thing fits sweet
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for my 2009 ski doo rev xp's because a new cover from ski doo was $200+. A couple days after I placed the order I got a screaming deal on a pair of fitted ski doo covers and figured on sending these covers back. After seeing how they fit I decided to keep these and sell the fitted covers. These cover the whole machine including the tunnel and the gas window is in the right spot.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Fits 1996 SkiDoo Grand Touring
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit and easy to put on after fishing. Excellent quality with good elastic and numerous straps for travel tiedown.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J  Busman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fits perfect on my 2002 ski doo summit 700 with 144 inch track.
customer_reviews.author: tater salad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly and plenty of straps for a tight fit
customer_reviews.author: Dana Driscoll

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned when I ordered it rather or not it would fit the sled like a travel cover should. It fit like a glove and I am pleased with how it endured the wind and snow and mud from my vehicle while traveling. All in All, it was great deal!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rockie Phillips

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: nice for the price , but its a little long on the back section . but it still works fine on vintage sleds
customer_reviews.author: adam k

customer_reviews.title: SledGear snowmobile cover
customer_reviews.text: Great cover, especially for the price. Feels heavy duty to the touch, and there are many different strapping points with all the straps provide, to secure the cover for either storing in the yard or for trailering. Make sure you measure from tip of ski to rear edge and order per their sizing charts; if you do the covers should go over the entire machine including the ski-to-shock attachment points.
customer_reviews.author: A Vermonter

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 1990 Polaris Sport with the extended gear rack
customer_reviews.text: This cover fits my 1990 polaris sport 340 with extended gear rack perfectly. It comes with a bunch of extra straps etc and I took off all I didn't need as the elastic fits well on my model. Looks decent and as a plus fits back into its carry case easily.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover!
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover for the price. At first it was a little complicated to get on properly because there are so many straps, but after trailering it with the cover on, we were glad for all the straps - it's very secure. It's also nice that there is an attached bag to stuff it in once you remove it. We also like the zipper access to the gas tank. Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: TLT

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are very nice quality, but seem to fade in the sunlight rather quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Marchwick

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit my sled well.
customer_reviews.text: The handlebars tore through the cover about 200 miles into a 2000 mile trip across the country. Everything was strapped securely but there are certain areas where there is slack in the cover and nothing can be done to tighten it up. Unfortunetly both bar ends tore through the cover and it is no longer waterproof. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sledwrecker

customer_reviews.title: Good sled cover for the price
customer_reviews.text: This sled cover was for a 2004 Skidoo Renegade 600. Works well so far. I am amazed at all the straps for this cover. No instructions were included.
customer_reviews.author: Byron E. Baker

customer_reviews.title: It might not be a perfect fit, but it worked excellent for trailering and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Arctic cat 2013 XF 1100 sno pro limited. It might not be a perfect fit, but it worked excellent for trailering and appears to be of good quality. Very happy with this instead of purchasing a 200.00 Arctic cat cover.
customer_reviews.author: Qoreycube

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product!! Fits our sleds great and great canvas material. I measured the size to ours and figured I'd try for the price and loved them. There are lots of straps but hey at least you will not loose the cover and you can cut off what you don't want.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: 99 summit 600 with 139 track.....works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: What a deal.....so much cheaper then other options. Fits very well on my 99 summit 600 with 139 track.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa F.

customer_reviews.title: Cover is an awesome product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Cover is an awesome product for the money. Fit my XC700 and Indy 500 perfectly as described. Plenty of versatility and the storage bag being connected is a huge plus in my opinion, can't lose it so easily!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gleyre

product_meta.title: Classic Accessories SledGear Deluxe Snowmobile Travel Cover, X-Large
product_meta.description: Size:Snowmobiles 119" - 127" LClassic Accessories Deluxe Snowmobile Travel Covers are designed to protect snowmobiles even in the heaviest snow storms. They are constructed from highly durable, heavy-duty Protect Extreme fabric with PU backing made for extreme weather and abrasion resistance. These covers include a fuel tank access door, making fuelling easy and fast without removing the cover. Also included are an integrated trailering system with built-in adjustable straps and tension panels and hood liners made from non-scratch material. This Classic Accessories cover is easy to maintain and includes a three-year .
feature_bullets: Elastic hem cord for a fast and tight fit
Integrated trailering system with built-in quick adjusting straps
Tension panels tightly secure cover for highway travel

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars245 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
